Listen.  The only thing keeping me interested in the game is sending 
team through scenarios to see what final stats could be.

The easiest way to make improvements to the game is to create new 
scenarios.  Well, it might be usefull to know what types of scenarios 
are in existance and to see how well we know what scenarios are 
already in existance.
